node.title: The Complete Guide to Refinancing
node.excerpt: There are different reasons why people refinance their home loan. For most people, interest rate often the biggist driver as banks always have special offers to win market share.

node.title: What is it and how to avoid LMI
node.excerpt: LMI is only applicable if your home loan poses a high risk to the bank which is typically when youâ€™re borrowing more than 80% of the purchase price.

node.title: To fix or not to fix your home loan
node.excerpt: There is no way to tell whether aÂ fixed rate home loanÂ is better than a variable rate loan. This is because interest rates can go either way in the future.Â

node.title: What is it and how to avoid break costs
node.excerpt: Break costs are fees charged by lenders when you make extra repayments on a fixed rate home loan. If you pay off the loan entirely then you will be charged a break cost.
